articles.title: A silent kidney crisis is spreading faster than anyone expected
articles.description: Chronic kidney disease has surged to nearly 800 million cases and is now among the top causes of death worldwide. articles.description: Scientists have revealed that Hawaiian monk seals produce far more underwater vocalizations than previously believed. articles.title: Supercomputers decode the strange behavior of Enceladus’s plumes
articles.description: Cutting-edge simulations show that Enceladus’ plumes are losing 20–40% less mass than earlier estimates suggested. The new models provide sharper insights into subsurface conditions that future landers may one day probe directly.

articles.title: Blocking one enzyme may break the link between alcohol and liver disease
articles.description: Scientists discovered that alcohol activates a sugar-producing pathway in the body, creating fructose that may reinforce addictive drinking.
